flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: This tutorial shows you how to create a Lisbeth Salander costume, including how to make your own bleached skull mohawk shirt and other tutorials.  Based off of the book/movies The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo.
guide.title: Lisbeth Salander - Girl with the Dragon Tattoo Tutorial
